skills.name: System Upgrade
skills.description: Upgrade your system with a powerful new patch, boosting your defense and strength.

skills.name: Compile Time Optimization
skills.description: Optimize your code compilation process, significantly increasing your attack for a short time.

skills.name: System Overdrive
skills.description: Push your system to its limits, temporarily increasing your attack, speed and defense.

skills.name: Swift Shadow Step
skills.description: Embrace the shadows, increasing your speed and leaving your opponent vulnerable by decreasing their defense.

effects.name: Increased Speed
effects.description: Your movement becomes swift as a shadow.

effects.name: Weakened Defense
effects.description: Your opponent's defenses crumble under the weight of shadows.

skills.name: Shadow Rend
skills.description: A surge of dark energy tears through your enemy, inflicting significant damage and lowering their attack power.

skills.name: Void Shield
skills.description: Call upon the power of the void, creating a protective barrier around yourself, significantly increasing your defense and granting a temporary boost to your health.

skills.description: Unleash a tempest of dark energy, dealing massive damage to your enemy and decreasing their attack power and speed.

skills.name: Build Project
skills.description: A powerful command that compiles and links your project, summoning the spirits of efficiency and order.

effects.name: Optimized Code
effects.description: Improves the overall performance of your project.

skills.name: Generate Code
skills.description: A command that generates boilerplate code for your project, making it easier to get started and saving you precious time.

effects.name: Faster Development
effects.description: Increases your coding speed, allowing you to iterate faster and make progress quicker.

effects.name: Streamlined Code
effects.description: Improves the quality and readability of your code.

skills.name: Find Package
skills.description: A command that locates and includes external dependencies for your project, expanding your abilities and granting you access to powerful new tools.

effects.name: Expanded Capabilities
effects.description: Unlocks new features and functionalities for your project.

effects.name: Enhanced Stability
effects.description: Improves the robustness and reliability of your project.

skills.name: Target Compile Features
skills.description: A command that sets specific compilation options for your project, allowing you to tailor the build process to your needs.

effects.name: Optimized Performance
effects.description: Enhances the performance of your project by leveraging specific compiler features.

effects.name: Reduced Memory Usage
effects.description: Minimizes the memory footprint of your project, making it more efficient.

skills.name: Add Subdirectory
skills.description: A command that integrates subprojects into your main project, creating a complex and interconnected build system.

effects.name: Modular Structure
effects.description: Improves the organization and maintainability of your project.

effects.name: Increased Complexity
effects.description: Increases the complexity of your project, allowing you to build more intricate features.

skills.name: Install
skills.description: A command that installs your project's files to a specific location, making it readily available for use.

effects.name: Easy Deployment
effects.description: Simplifies the process of deploying your project to a target system.

effects.name: Wide Accessibility
effects.description: Makes your project accessible to a wider audience.

skills.name: Target Link Libraries
skills.description: A command that links external libraries to your project, providing access to their functionalities and expanding your project's capabilities.

effects.name: Expanded Functionality
effects.description: Unlocks new features and abilities for your project.

effects.name: Enhanced Stability
effects.description: Improves the robustness and reliability of your project.

skills.name: Object-Oriented Programming
skills.description: Embrace the power of modularity and code reusability. Create a class for your character, defining their attributes and actions.

effects.name: Attribute Boost
effects.description: Increase your character's strength and defense, fortifying them against enemy attacks.

effects.name: Defense Enhancement
effects.description: Enhance your character's defenses, making them more resistant to incoming attacks.

effects.name: Enhanced Agility
effects.description: Improve your character's agility, granting them a temporary increase in speed.

skills.name: Event-Driven Programming
skills.description: Trigger a chain of events to unleash a powerful attack! The more events you trigger, the stronger the attack becomes.
